articles.title: Elon Musk asks if America should 'liberate the people of Britain' in tirade against U.K. government - CNBC
articles.description: The tech billionaire and key adviser to U.S. President-elect Donald Trump has taken to social media to air his grievances with the British government.
articles.content:
Tesla CEO Elon Musk, Co-Chair of the newly announced Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE), arrives on Capitol Hill on December 05, 2024 in Washington, DC.
